attributes.action: Create a Bike Pump Track in Merton
attributes.additional_details: To encourage MTB Riders to do more exercise and have fun on this attraction.
attributes.background: MTB Riders would love a pump track created in Merton as there are no MTB attractions here and a pump track does not need a lot of resources to be made, it just requires land which there is plenty.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 
https://www.merton.gov.uk/council-and-local-democracy/get-involved/petitions
